title: Incompleteness, Meaning, and What It Says About Us
summary: Gödel’s incompleteness theorem showed that even mathematics, the most precise tool we possess, carries within it inevitable limitations. This article reflects on what incompleteness says about the nature of human thought and the search for meaning.

title: AI Utopia: Dreams, Risks, and Design
summary: A short meditation on what an AI 'utopia' might look like, the social and ethical trade-offs involved, and practical design choices that could nudge systems toward human flourishing.
